about_the_game:
The Adventure of Ninomae Ina'nis is a vertical shoot 'em up game where you control Ninomae Ina'nis from Hololive Myth and her companion AO-chan.

Story Mode

The Takodachi have gone missing and it is up to Ina and AO-chan to find them! This is a casual mode where players will make their way through three levels unraveling the mystery of the missing Takodachi. This mode has unlimited continues and saves your progress so that you can continue from the start of the last level that you reached. The Final Battle plays out a little differently depending on how many Takodachi you are able to save.

Arcade Mode

Test your mettle in this mode dedicated to high score chasers. The mode features the three Story Mode levels plus three remixed levels for the second loop called Another Tomorrow. The mode features a Score Multiplier mechanic that players can take advantage of to increase their scores immensely. Your Progress won’t be saved and if you run out of health you won’t be able to continue. Do you have the resolve needed to face the unknown threat of the second loop?

Score Board!

Arcade Mode scores are saved to a local scoreboard. Try your best to rack up the highest scores you possibly can!

Stage Select!

As you progress through the levels in the different game modes, you will be able to play them individually through the Stage Select. Stages unlock as you reach them so if you need to practice a particular level before committing to it in Arcade Mode then the Stage Select is your best option.


This game is published under CCMC Corp(※1)'s Indie game brand "holo Indie".(※2)
This game is allowed to be monetized under the examination and terms of "holo Indie".
Please note that any monetized derivative work games that include Cover Corp.'s content outside of holo Indie is not covered by these terms and is not allowed.

※1. About CCMC Corp.
CCMC Corp. is entrusted with website management (ex: Steam) including, examination, publishing and other necessary tasks by Cover Corp.

※2. About "holo Indie"
holo Indie's objective is to cooperate with hololive production fans and creators.
It is a game brand that offers "Game Creator Support Program" for the derivative work games.
For more details about "holo Indie", Please refer to the Cover Corp.'s "Derivative work guidelines".

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo T8300
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 270 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Lowest tier hardware the game has been tested on.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 270 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Primary hardware the game has been tested on.
